root.name: Rogue Ops
root.description: OverviewReleased in the US in 2003 and both Europe and Japan in early 2004, Rogue Ops follows the adventures of counter-terrorism agent Nikki ConnorsÂ who is on a quest for revenge following the deaths of both her child and husband. Published by Kemco and developed by Bits Studios, the game features eight missions in which players are given a variety of weapons and gadgets to complete them.

similar_games.game: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty
